评论概述: Soft and Comfy, But Not as Stylish as Expected
评论详情: The AUTOMET Women's T-Shirt is definitely soft and comfortable, but it didn’t quite live up to the stylish look in the photos. The fit isn’t very tailored, so the design doesn’t have that crisp, cool vibe I was hoping for. I also got the tan color, which didn’t flatter me as a blonde with blue eyes—it just felt a bit dull. While it’s cozy for casual wear, it’s not as cute or polished as I expected. The quality is pretty decent though so maybe a different color would work.

评论概述: Stylish and Versatile—Perfect for Any Occasion
评论详情: I recently purchased the AUTOMET Women’s Lace Short Sleeve T-Shirt, and I couldn’t be happier with my choice! The lace detailing adds a lovely touch of elegance that makes it perfect for both casual outings and more polished business settings.  The fit is true to size and incredibly comfortable. I love how the fabric feels soft against my skin, and it drapes beautifully without being clingy. The short sleeves are just the right length, making it a great option for warmer weather while still looking sophisticated.  I’ve worn this top with everything from jeans to skirts, and it always looks fantastic. Plus, it washes well without losing shape or color. If you’re looking for a trendy yet versatile top that can transition from day to night, I highly recommend this one! It’s become a staple in my wardrobe.
I got an XL and it's true to size. I love this blouse so much I have it in 3 shades!
They all fit really well, to wear when a t-shirt isn’t appropriate

SUPER cute and very flattering . . . be aware of your bra choice (I wear nude with the green and dark red shirts and black with the black one), but it's not terribly noticeable. I'd say size down if you might be between sizes (I usually prefer mediums in t-shirts, but a small is better with this one).
Fits according to stated size.  Looks great.
Love this top. Fit perfectly. Nice army green color. Very comfortable.

This shirt is both stylish and comfortable and is suitable for so many things. I’ve worn mine to the office, to church, and to run errands in. My only complaint is that it has to be delicately washed, and either line or flat dried. My daughter accidentally dried this in the dryer once and one of the sleeves snagged just a bit. The delicate lacy material should be handled carefully for sure. Overall a beautiful shirt that I enjoy wearing.
I love the texture of the fabric and the lace is so dainty.  Totally want to order others in different colors

What I like best about this top are the lacy sleeves and the yoke pleats going out from the neckline.  I feel very confident wearing this top and I think it is very flattering.  The overall width and longer length allows me to wear it with a skirt or jeans and helps hide my stomach sticking out. Additionally, the lacy sleeves are feminine and make me less self conscious about my arms.  I bought the XL, and I’m  5”6” tall and 185 lbs.  I also bought the light blue and white colors, but felt they were a bit see-through and returned them.
